overview: Blue Coyote Pictures presents "Cougars Hunting #2", starring Lena Kova, Ivana Tramp, Pepper, Laura Schwarz, June Kelly and Terry Sweet. We're on the prowl searching for cougars who want to fuck just as much as we do. We found some of the hottest babes and they were more than ready for some action!
tagline: They're in heat & hungry for fresh meat!
title: Cougars Hunting 2
